commands.name: !join
commands.description: Connect/Join Fubot to your current Channel

commands.name: !play
commands.description: Adds a track to the end of the Queue. Takes either a URL or Search Term as arguments

commands.name: !play-next
commands.description: Same as !play but adds the track to the first position in the Queue.

commands.name: !play-now
commands.description: Same as !play-next but also skips currently playing song

commands.name: !stop
commands.description: Clears out the Queue, stop the current track and disconnect bot from current Channel

commands.name: !skip
commands.description: Skipp the current track and starts playing the next track Queued

commands.name: !queue
commands.description: Prints out a list of the current Queue

commands.name: !now-playing
commands.description: Prints out information about the current track

commands.name: !volume
commands.description: Allows user to change the bots global volume. Takes a number between 0 and 100 (%) as an argument

commands.name: !lyrics
commands.description: Attempts to retrieve and print the lyrics for the current track
